casebody.data:
STATE
v.
HOLDER 2018-1206 Supreme Court of Ohio. December 26, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

Sua sponte, cause no longer held for the decisions in State v. Dunson, case No. 2017-0186, and State v. Braden, case Nos. 2017-1579 and 2017-1609. The case is now held for the decision in State v. Taylor, case No. 2018-0797, and the briefing schedule remains stayed.
